greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the conversion factor from the old derived SI unit lm (lumen) to the combination of 2019 SI units K_{cd}*h*(Δν_{Cs})^2.
comment: For the seven units of the 2019 SI system of units see the BIPM link with the resolutions of the CGPM, and A322415.

The 2010 SI unit K_{cd} is the luminous efficacy of monochromatic radiation of frequency 540 x 10^{12} Hz, given by K_{cd} = 683 lm/W  = 683 cd sr s^3 kg^{-1} m^{-2}, with the old SI unit cd and the derived unit sr = steradian.
link: BIPM, CGPM-2018 [See the link "Resolutions of the CGPM" there.]
Wikipedia, 2019 redefinition of SI base units
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Feb 13 2019
